name: DOORPUNCHER
description:
What lies beyond your front door? Is it a friendly neighbor? Or something more foul...?

You are DOORPUNCHER. You have a special front door. Sometimes it opens up to our world, sometimes it opens up to HELL. Punch DEMONS with your beefy fists. TRY not to punch GRANNIES, PUPPIES, and BABIES. 

Consider this game a proof of concept! We ran out of time to add the multiple enemies planned, and some mechanics still need some polishing. Feedback appreciated!

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:
  • Left Punch: Y
  • Right Punch: T
  • Make your next punch cancel a GREEN attack: B
  • WASD: Aim
CONTROLLER CONTROLS:
  • Left Punch: Left Shoulder Button/Trigger
  • Right Punch: Right Shoulder Button/Trigger
  • Make your next punch cancel a GREEN attack:  A ( X on PS)
  • Control Stick/D-Pad: Aim
HOW TO PLAY:

Art: LumpyTouch
Programming/Design: helpcomputer

Royalty-Free Music:
TeknoAXE - Until Your Engine Stops - Ignition
PerituneMaterial - BattleField5 (and BattleField5 Retro version)
PerituneMaterial - Dungeon Tower (and Dungeon Tower Retro version)
PerituneMaterial - Pray Organ3
PerituneMaterial -Steam Fortress
